Congressional Reports: Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed

The Committee on Resources, to whom was referred the bill (H.R. 3910) to provide emergency drought relief to the city of Corpus Christi, Texas, and the Canadian River Municipal Water Authority, Texas, and for other purposes, having considered the same, report favorably thereon with an amendment and recommend that the bill as amended do pass.
